segments.text: What a disgusting mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring over the sink, drenching the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is submerged in that filthy puddle, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping a plate with a towel that probably smells like old food.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are filthy too, sneaking cookies like thieves on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is deep in the jar, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, palm out, eager for the dirty treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slick with water and cookie bits soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide this indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of slipping in that contaminated water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets expose more dust and who knows what inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is utterly revolting in its carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes by the sink look ready to topple into the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR
